vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in U_BANK.collect (patch_1.sol#26-32):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(msg.sender.call.value(_am)()) (patch_1.sol#29)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- Acc (patch_1.sol#30)
